snippet: As using technology to monitor sleep and other activities rises in popularity, these mobile applications can help you gather and assess this information.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights apps to monitor daily activities, including sleep and exercise; points out they track personal habits and identify patterns.
lead_paragraph: As using technology to monitor sleep and other activities rises in popularity, these mobile applications can help you gather and assess this information.

headline.print_headline: Ways to Track Personal Habits and Identify Patterns
headline.main: Video Feature: ‘Quantified Self’ Apps to Help Track Habits and Identify Patterns
